revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = Tamato |image = [[File:Tamato.png]] |caption = This Berry is large and spicy. When eaten during the cold season, it warms the body from inside. |growtime = 2h 24m 0s |harvest = 25 berries |replant = 20% |points = 625 |flavor = {{!}} 20 {{!}} 10 {{!}} 0 {{!}} 0 {{!}} 0 }} '''Tamato''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding a [[Razz]] with at least 1 [[Pomeg]]. The [[Razz]] will then have a chance to mutate into this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Harvest Stages durations ! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- | 0-430s || 430-1400s || 1400-4000s || 4000-8640s || 8640-17280s |- | [[File:AllTreeSeed.png|50px]] || [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:TamatoTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:TamatoTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:TamatoTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Tamato berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 60px;" | [[File:Razz.png|30px]]
[[Razz]] || style="width: 60px;" | [[File:Razz.png|30px]]
